contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XETOT | image = | city = [[Tampico, Tamaulipas|Tampico]] | area = [[Tampico, Tamaulipas|Tampico]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | branding = ABC Radio | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 1190 AM | format = | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = | webcast = | website = [http://www.oem.com.mx/abcradio/ oem.com.mx] | affiliations = }} '''XETOT''' (branded as ABC Radio) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[Spanish language|Spanish-language]] AM [[radio station]] that serves the [[Tampico, Tamaulipas|Tampico]], [[Tamaulipas]] market area. ==External links== *{{AMQ|XETOT}} * [http://www.oem.com.mx/abcradio/ oem.com.mx] * [http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/listtama.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio stations] * [http://radiostationworld.com/locations/Mexico/radio.asp?m=ta~ radiostationworld.com List of radio stations in Tamaulipas] <br clear=all> {{Tampico Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Tampico]]
